meta.title: Learn Japanese 50 Sounds - Gojuon Writing Practice
meta.description: Comprehensive Japanese 50 Sounds (Gojuon) learning website: Complete charts, standard pronunciation, interactive handwriting practice, dictation quizzes, kana lyrics, and AI recognition. Optimized for tablets and styluses, providing a smooth learning experience to quickly help beginners memorize Japanese through handwriting.
